short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays reactions as red/green marks in the scrollbar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds marks to the scrollbar to show reactions on GitHub issues and PRs. Marks and comment borders are colored by karma, which is the difference between +1s and -1s.
